title: How do I listen to music through the Bluetooth headset?
answer:
Once your TalkBand B2 is connected to your phone using Bluetooth, put on the Bluetooth headset to listen to music. 

 ● When the Bluetooth headset is attached to the strap, you can only play music through your phone or wired headset. 

 ● While your phone is playing music, you can remove the Bluetooth headset from the strap to start listening through the headset.
